articles.title: New Xbox One update lets you customize the order of your Guide tabs - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft has released a new Xbox One update that brings a number of changes to the Guide menu, including the ability to customize the order of the Guide tabs. You’ll also now see live thumbnails when browsing Mixer streams.
articles.content:
Youll also see live thumbnails when browsing Mixer streams

articles.description: Infinix has today launched two new budget devices namely Hot 9 and Hot 9 Pro. Both the devices comes with quad rear cameras, punch-hole cutout and more.

articles.title: Panasonic Lumix G9 Micro Four-Thirds Camera With 5-Axis IBIS, 4K Video, Weatherproof Body Launched in Ind... - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Panasonic India has launched the Lumix G9 here, finally, after announcing it globally way back in 2017. The micro four-thirds camera supports 4K video recording, IBIS, dual card slots and lots more.

articles.author: Hayato Huseman
articles.title: Galaxy S20 vs. OnePlus 8 camera comparison: Zoom trumps macro - Android Central
articles.description: The Galaxy S20 and OnePlus 8 both have triple camera arrays, but Samsung and OnePlus went in different directions for the individual lenses in those systems. Both phones take great photos, but in the end one is more well-rounded and versatile than the other.
articles.content:
Source: Hayato Huseman / Android Central
